participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Dedicated and introspective, Alex values her relationships but often feels a bit out of sync with her family.
participant_1.background: I am a swimmer who is proud of my family but sometimes feel disconnected from them. I make sure my beta fish travels with me when I move. I bought a set of dice for my favorite tabletop game. I love my family and friends because they support me and help me grow. I don't go to Comic Con because it is not my kind of thing.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Creative and somewhat introverted, Jamie is passionate about music and is working on his self-confidence.
participant_2.background: My eye contact issues can get in the way of my work, but I'm trying my best to overcome them. I'm always up for going to a movie with my new love. I only wear tennis shoes. I'm a musician who recently became truthful with my coach. I don't care what my father thinks, I like what I like.

content.text: Hi there! I am a swimmer and I am also a musician. What are your hobbies?
Hi! I am a musician too. I play the guitar and piano. I also like to go to the movies with my new love.
That's awesome! I love going to the movies too. Do you have any pets?
I don't have any pets, but I love animals. I used to have a pet fish when I was younger.
I love animals too! I have a beta fish that I take with me when I move.
That's awesome! Beta fish are so cool. I wish I had one.
They're pretty easy to take care of. You should get one!
I'll think about it. Thanks for the suggestion!
Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to play tabletop games. I just bought a set of dice for my favorite game.
Tabletop games are so much fun! I love playing Dungeons and Dragons.
That's awesome! I've never played Dungeons and Dragons, but I've heard good things about it.
It's a lot of fun. You should try it sometime.
I'll think about it. Thanks for the suggestion
